configure_os.name: configure_os
configure_os.description: Specify if OS on PowerVS instances should be configure for SAP or if only PowerVS instances should be created.

dns_host_or_ip.name: dns_host_or_ip
dns_host_or_ip.description: DNS forwarder/server hosname or IP address. E.g., 10.10.10.6

nfs_path.name: nfs_path
nfs_path.description: Full path on NFS server (in form <hostname_or_ip>:<directory>, e.g., '10.20.10.4:/nfs').

ntp_host_or_ip.name: ntp_host_or_ip
ntp_host_or_ip.description: NTP forwarder/server hosname or IP address. E.g., 10.10.10.7

os_image_distro.name: os_image_distro
os_image_distro.description: Image distribution to use. Supported values are 'SLES' or 'RHEL'. OS release versions may be specified in optional parameters.

proxy_host_or_ip.name: proxy_host_or_ip
proxy_host_or_ip.description: Proxy hosname or IP address with port. E.g., 10.10.10.4:3128

pvs_additional_networks.name: pvs_additional_networks
pvs_additional_networks.description: Existing list of subnets name to be attached to node. First network has to be a management network

pvs_cloud_connection_count.name: pvs_cloud_connection_count
pvs_cloud_connection_count.description: Required number of Cloud connections which will be created/Reused. Maximum is 2 per location

pvs_hana_image_name.name: pvs_hana_image_name
pvs_hana_image_name.description: Image Names to import into the service

pvs_hana_instance_name.name: pvs_hana_instance_name
pvs_hana_instance_name.description: Name of instance which will be created

pvs_hana_sap_profile_id.name: pvs_hana_sap_profile_id
pvs_hana_sap_profile_id.description: SAP PROFILE ID. If this is mentioned then Memory, processors, proc_type and sys_type will not be taken into account

pvs_hana_storage_config.name: pvs_hana_storage_config
pvs_hana_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
pvs_hana_storage_config.description: File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for SAP HANA. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many sotrage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS service. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the strucutre. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

pvs_netweaver_image_name.name: pvs_netweaver_image_name
pvs_netweaver_image_name.description: Image Names to import into the service

pvs_netweaver_instance_name.name: pvs_netweaver_instance_name
pvs_netweaver_instance_name.description: Name of instance which will be created

pvs_netweaver_server_type.name: pvs_netweaver_server_type
pvs_netweaver_server_type.description: Processor type e980, s922, s1022 or e1080

pvs_netweaver_storage_config.name: pvs_netweaver_storage_config
pvs_netweaver_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
pvs_netweaver_storage_config.description: File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for SAP NetWeaver. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many sotrage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS service. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the strucutre. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

pvs_resource_group_name.name: pvs_resource_group_name
pvs_resource_group_name.description: Existing PowerVS service resource group Name

pvs_sap_network_cidr.name: pvs_sap_network_cidr
pvs_sap_network_cidr.description: CIDR for new network for SAP system

pvs_sap_network_name.name: pvs_sap_network_name
pvs_sap_network_name.description: Name for new network for SAP system

pvs_service_name.name: pvs_service_name
pvs_service_name.description: Existing Name of the PowerVS service

pvs_share_image_name.name: pvs_share_image_name
pvs_share_image_name.description: Image Names to import into the service

pvs_share_instance_name.name: pvs_share_instance_name
pvs_share_instance_name.description: Name of instance which will be created

pvs_share_server_type.name: pvs_share_server_type
pvs_share_server_type.description: Processor type e980, s922, s1022 or e1080

pvs_share_storage_config.name: pvs_share_storage_config
pvs_share_storage_config.type:
object({
    names      = string
    disks_size = string
    counts     = string
    tiers      = string
    paths      = string
  })
pvs_share_storage_config.description: File systems to be created and attached to PowerVS instance for shared storage file systems. 'disk_sizes' are in GB. 'count' specify over how many sotrage volumes the file system will be striped. 'tiers' specifies the storage tier in PowerVS service. For creating multiple file systems, specify multiple entries in each parameter in the strucutre. E.g., for creating 2 file systems, specify 2 names, 2 disk sizes, 2 counts, 2 tiers and 2 paths.

ssh_private_key.name: ssh_private_key
ssh_private_key.description: Private Key to configure Instance, Will not be uploaded to server

access_host_or_ip.name: access_host_or_ip
access_host_or_ip.description: Public IP to manage the environment

hana_instance_private_ips.name: hana_instance_private_ips
hana_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of the HANA instance.

netweaver_instance_private_ips.name: netweaver_instance_private_ips
netweaver_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of all NetWeaver instances.

share_fs_instance_private_ips.name: share_fs_instance_private_ips
share_fs_instance_private_ips.description: Private IPs of the Share FS instance.
